resources.string:
Carmen is a licensed esthetician with twenty-two years of experience. Her success is based on providing the highest quality services and professional skin care products.

“I really get so much pleasure from my work because when clients leave they feel better about themselves”!

We are pleased to offer only the highest quality products including Dr. Renaud, NK Brown, Gehwol, Dr. Biodroga, OPI and Footlogix.
